content.body: cyber_dodo: You may want to read up on the previous W3C PICS and POWDER proposals, and the rest of the history around this idea — which goes back 30 years. The summary is that it’s all been tried before, and it’s always failed to get adoption — for reasons that are fairly well understood. So you might end up find it’s not a great use of your time to end up re-proposing it somewhere.
